entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as the one who sent his Death Eaters to steal a prophecy. He is also mentioned in the context of the prophecy made about Harry and him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person about whom the prophecy was made. He is also mentioned in the conversation between Dumbledore and himself.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who is having a conversation with Harry about the prophecy.

entities.name: ronald weasley
entities.description: Ronald Weasley is mentioned by Dumbledore as someone to whom Harry should confide the information about the prophecy.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is also mentioned by Dumbledore as someone to whom Harry should confide the information about the prophecy.

relationships.description: Dumbledore advises Harry to confide in his friends, Ronald Weasley and Hermione Granger, about the prophecy.
Voldemort employs Death Eaters to steal a prophecy.
